Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.1 Paṭiccavāra » 9.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 9.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
17.
824Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  dassanena pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
825Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  bhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
826Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe… . (1)
18.
827Dassanena pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
828Bhāvanāya pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  bhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
